title: Memory Add Input
description: Store a conversation pair (user input and agent response) in the MemoryOS system for building persistent dialogue history and contextual records. The memory will flow through short-term, mid-term, and potentially long-term memory based on relevance and heat.

explanation.description: One sentence explanation of why this memory is being stored

user_input.description: The user's input, question, or message to be stored

agent_response.description: The agent's response or reply to the user input

timestamp.description: Optional timestamp in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format (auto-generated if not provided)

meta_data.description: Optional metadata about the conversation context (platform, importance, etc.)
